title: Listening Snow Tower - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Historical   Josei   Martial Arts   Tragedy   Wuxia
tags: Adapted to Drama   Betrayal   Short Story   Strong Love Interests
author: Cang Yue   沧月
description:
Xiao Yi Qing and Shu Jing Rong were both extraordinary. As the blood-soaked years passed, they fought to conquer the pugilist world. But, their pasts persuaded each that ruthlessness was the only way to survive. 

They could convince others to bow to them, but could not help the love, hate, and suspicion in their hearts. 

Perhaps they would only be able to let down their guard when their weapons met for the last time.>
